max_nearest_stops.description: Number of stops around origin and destination considered by the users when computing journeys

max_distance_nearest_stops.description: Maximum distance (in meters) accepted when looking for the nearest stops of origin and destination

journey_time_range.description: Time range (in seconds, from given start time) explored when computing journeys. Set to None for keeping all stop times

max_nb_trips.description: Maximum number of trips explored while computing journeys

additional_transfers.description: Additional transfers explored after finding a solution when computing journeys

multi_source.description: Boolean indicating if the router should be called on multiple sources at once

no_journey_timeout.description: Time waited by agents that didn't find any journey before calling router again

nb_journey_trials.description: Number of attempts of computing a journey before quitting

service_vehicle_prefix.description: Prefix of the service vehicles ids, built using the prefix and the trip id

use_shortest_path.description: Boolean indicating if shortest paths should be used for the service vehicle moves

0.description: Multiplicative factor of the time spent in tramways

1.description: Multiplicative factor of the time spent in subways

2.description: Multiplicative factor of the time spent in trains

3.description: Multiplicative factor of the time spent in buses

4.description: Multiplicative factor of the time spent in on-demand transports

-1.description: Multiplicative factor of the time spent walking

first_wait.description: Multiplicative factor of the first waiting time. Default will use 'wait'

wait.description: Multiplicative factor of the time spent waiting

route_choice_parameters.description: Parameters of the decision mode among different journeys

teta.description: Teta parameter for the modified_berliaire_1999 method

beta.description: Beta parameter for the modified_berliaire_1999 method
